name: Goat Life
description: Goat Life is an unusual 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to go through a variety of levels for a goat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 200MB DirectX: Version 5.2
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 9.0
